name: Cappex - $2,500 STEM Excellence Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for high school students pursuing STEM degrees. Must maintain 3.0 GPA and demonstrate passion for science, technology, engineering, or mathematics through coursework and activities. Essay required on STEM career goals.

name: Cappex - Women in Engineering Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for female high school students planning to major in engineering. Must demonstrate interest in engineering through coursework, projects, or extracurricular activities. GPA 3.0+ required.
stem_fields: Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Civil Engineering

name: Cappex - Computer Science Future Leader Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for high school students pursuing computer science or software engineering. Must demonstrate coding skills through projects, competitions, or coursework. Portfolio or GitHub link encouraged.

name: Cappex - Minority Students in STEM Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for underrepresented minority high school students pursuing STEM fields. Open to Black, Hispanic, Native American students. Must demonstrate financial need and academic achievement. Essay on diversity in STEM required.

name: Cappex - Biology and Life Sciences Scholarship
description: $2,000 scholarship for students interested in biology, life sciences, or pre-medicine. Must have strong grades in science courses and demonstrate interest through research, volunteering, or extracurriculars.
stem_fields: Biology, Life Sciences, Pre-Medicine, Biomedical Sciences

name: Cappex - Mathematics Scholar Award
description: $3,500 scholarship for high school students with exceptional mathematics skills. Must have participated in math competitions or advanced coursework. GPA 3.5+ in mathematics required.

name: Cappex - Environmental Science Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for students passionate about environmental science and sustainability. Must submit essay on environmental challenges and solutions. Community service in environmental causes encouraged.

name: Cappex - First Generation STEM Student Scholarship
description: $4,500 scholarship for first-generation college students pursuing STEM degrees. Must demonstrate financial need and academic potential. Essay on challenges and goals as first-gen student required.

name: Cappex - Mechanical Engineering Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for high school students planning to major in mechanical engineering. Must demonstrate understanding of mechanical systems through projects, internships, or coursework.

name: Cappex - Chemistry Achievement Scholarship
description: $2,000 scholarship for students with strong performance in chemistry. Must have GPA 3.3+ in chemistry courses and demonstrate interest in chemical sciences through research or projects.

name: Cappex - Women in Computer Science Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for female students pursuing computer science or related technology fields. Must demonstrate coding ability and commitment to increasing female representation in tech.
stem_fields: Computer Science, Software Engineering, Information Technology

name: Cappex - Physics and Astronomy Scholarship
description: $3,500 scholarship for students interested in physics, astrophysics, or astronomy. Must have strong mathematics and physics grades. Essay on physics concepts or astronomical phenomena required.

name: Cappex - Electrical Engineering Scholarship
description: $3,500 scholarship for students planning to major in electrical or computer engineering. Must have completed physics and advanced math courses. GPA 3.0+ required.

name: Cappex - Data Science and Analytics Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for students interested in data science, statistics, or analytics. Must demonstrate analytical skills through coursework or projects. Programming experience preferred.
stem_fields: Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Analytics

name: Cappex - Biomedical Engineering Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for students interested in biomedical engineering or medical devices. Must demonstrate interest in healthcare technology through research, volunteering, or projects.
stem_fields: Biomedical Engineering, Biology, Engineering, Health Sciences

name: Cappex - Cybersecurity Scholar Award
description: $5,000 scholarship for high school students interested in cybersecurity and information security. Must demonstrate understanding of security concepts through courses, certifications, or competitions.
stem_fields: Cybersecurity, Information Security, Computer Science, IT

name: Cappex - Neuroscience and Brain Research Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for students interested in neuroscience, psychology, or brain research. Must demonstrate strong performance in biology and interest in understanding the brain.

name: Cappex - Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning Scholarship
description: $6,000 scholarship for students interested in artificial intelligence and machine learning. Must demonstrate understanding of AI concepts through projects, coursework, or competitions.
stem_fields: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Computer Science, Data Science

name: Cappex - Civil Engineering and Infrastructure Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for students planning to major in civil engineering or construction management. Must demonstrate interest in infrastructure and urban development.
stem_fields: Civil Engineering, Construction, Urban Planning, Structural Engineering

name: Cappex - Robotics and Automation Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for students involved in robotics competitions or automation projects. Must demonstrate hands-on experience with robotics through FIRST Robotics or similar programs.

name: Cappex - Genetics and Genomics Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for students interested in genetics, genomics, or molecular biology. Must demonstrate understanding of genetic principles through coursework or research.

name: Cappex - Aerospace Engineering Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for students interested in aerospace engineering, aviation, or space exploration. Must demonstrate passion for flight and space through projects or activities.
stem_fields: Aerospace Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Physics, Aviation

name: Cappex - Marine Biology and Oceanography Scholarship
description: $2,000 scholarship for students interested in marine biology, oceanography, or aquatic sciences. Must demonstrate commitment to ocean conservation and marine research.
stem_fields: Marine Biology, Oceanography, Biology, Environmental Science

name: Cappex - Black Students in STEM Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship specifically for Black high school students pursuing STEM degrees. Must demonstrate academic achievement and commitment to diversity in STEM. Essay on representation required.

name: Cappex - Materials Science and Engineering Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for students interested in materials science, nanotechnology, or materials engineering. Must demonstrate understanding of material properties and applications.

name: Cappex - Web Development and Design Scholarship
description: $3,500 scholarship for students interested in web development, front-end design, or full-stack development. Must submit portfolio of websites created.
stem_fields: Web Development, Computer Science, Design, Programming

name: Cappex - Biotechnology and Genetic Engineering Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for students interested in biotechnology, genetic engineering, or molecular biology. Must submit essay on biotech applications and ethical considerations.

name: Cappex - Chemical Engineering Scholarship
description: $3,500 scholarship for students planning to major in chemical engineering. Must demonstrate understanding of chemical processes and industrial applications.
stem_fields: Chemical Engineering, Chemistry, Process Engineering, Manufacturing

name: Cappex - Game Development Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for students interested in game development, game design, or interactive media. Must submit portfolio showing game projects or design work.
stem_fields: Game Development, Computer Science, Design, Programming

name: Cappex - Geology and Earth Sciences Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for students interested in geology, earth sciences, or geophysics. Must demonstrate interest in understanding Earth processes and natural resources.
stem_fields: Geology, Earth Science, Geophysics, Environmental Science

name: Cappex - Women in Science Leadership Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for female students pursuing science degrees with demonstrated leadership in STEM. Must show commitment to mentoring and inspiring other women in science.

name: Cappex - Renewable Energy and Sustainability Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for students passionate about renewable energy and sustainable engineering. Must submit essay on the future of clean energy.
stem_fields: Renewable Energy, Environmental Engineering, Sustainability, Physics

name: Cappex - Hispanic Students in STEM Scholarship
description: $4,500 scholarship for Hispanic/Latino high school students pursuing STEM degrees. Must demonstrate academic achievement and commitment to increasing Hispanic representation in STEM.

name: Cappex - Software Quality Assurance Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for students interested in software testing, quality assurance, or software engineering. Must demonstrate understanding of software development lifecycle.
stem_fields: Software Engineering, Computer Science, Quality Assurance, Testing

name: Cappex - Nuclear Engineering Scholarship
description: $5,000 scholarship for students interested in nuclear engineering, nuclear physics, or radiation sciences. Must demonstrate strong foundation in physics and mathematics.

name: Cappex - Mobile App Development Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for students interested in mobile app development for iOS or Android. Must submit portfolio showing mobile apps developed.
stem_fields: Mobile Development, Computer Science, Software Engineering, Design

name: Cappex - Atmospheric Science and Climate Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for students interested in atmospheric science, meteorology, or climate science. Must demonstrate interest in weather systems and climate patterns.
stem_fields: Atmospheric Science, Meteorology, Climate Science, Environmental Science

name: Cappex - Pharmaceutical Sciences Scholarship
description: $3,500 scholarship for students interested in pharmaceutical sciences, pharmacology, or drug development. Must demonstrate interest in healthcare and medicine.
stem_fields: Pharmaceutical Sciences, Chemistry, Biology, Health Sciences

name: Cappex - Agricultural Engineering and Technology Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for students interested in agricultural engineering, precision agriculture, or farm technology. Must demonstrate understanding of technology in agriculture.

name: Cappex - Low-Income STEM Excellence Scholarship
description: $6,000 scholarship for high school students from low-income families pursuing STEM degrees. Must demonstrate financial need, academic achievement, and perseverance in STEM education.

name: Cappex - Forensic Science Scholarship
description: $2,500 scholarship for students interested in forensic science, crime scene investigation, or forensic chemistry. Must demonstrate interest in applying science to criminal justice.
stem_fields: Forensic Science, Chemistry, Biology, Criminal Justice

name: Cappex - Industrial Engineering and Operations Scholarship
description: $3,000 scholarship for students interested in industrial engineering, operations research, or supply chain management. Must demonstrate analytical and problem-solving skills.
stem_fields: Industrial Engineering, Operations Research, Manufacturing, Management

name: Cappex - Rural STEM Student Opportunity Scholarship
description: $4,000 scholarship for high school students from rural communities pursuing STEM education. Must demonstrate how rural background shapes STEM perspective and goals.
